name: League Manager 2022
description:
1. Choose the team you want!

The world’s best team is ready for you

2. Various systems of management

Make the best game with various and detailed managing systems.

3. this game provides experience based on reality (teams, player, league etc...)

Lead the legendary players to get the best results in the game which is almost like real

4. Observing your game of team in detail

Watch the game in detail, analyze the results, and make a legendary team.
